oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 4th Michigan Cav. reunion ribbon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 4th Michigan Cav. reunion ribbon, belonging to Pvt. Samuel Wallace Duncan (September 12, 1845-May 28, 1915), Co. M, 7th Penn. Vol. Cav. Regt., USA. Duncan was from Johnstown, Pennsylvania. He enlisted in February 1864.; Duncan stayed in the South after he was discharged in 1865. He died in Chattanooga and is buried at Forest Hills Cemetery.
